com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl

Class Holder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bitplan.simplegraph.impl.Holder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public class Holder<T>
extends Object
    generic holder to be use in e.g. in lambdas to access outer scope variables which need to be final
    Author:
    wf
